name: Card
description: `Form.Card` is a wrapper for the Card component to make it easier to use inside a form.

props.name: outset
props.doc: Whether or not to break out (using negative margins) on larger screens. Same as `outset` in [Card](/uilib/components/card/properties). But defaults to `true`

props.name: stack
props.doc: True to stack the sub components with space between. The `spacing` will default to `medium`. Same as `stack` in [Card](/uilib/components/card/properties). But defaults to `true`

props.name: title
props.doc: Define a title that appears on top of the Card.

props.name: responsive
props.doc: Define if the card should behave responsive. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: filled
props.doc: Define if the Card should get the same background color as the outline border.

props.name: outline
props.doc: Define the outline color. Defaults to `var(--card-outline-color)`.

props.name: backgroundColor
props.doc: Define the background color. Defaults to `var(--card-background-color)`.

props.name: element
props.doc: Define the type of element. Defaults to `section`.
